channel.title: People cant connect only i can [i need help]
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt]my request for help[/size]
ive alredy portforwarded and this is not a request for computer help ive been to [url=http://google.com]google.com[/url] [url=http://portforward.com]portforward.com[/url] searching for answers
but havent found anything since ive already portforwarded with starting port 43594 ending: 43594
im wondering if its something with my or connection or firewall i just want people to play
[URL=http://img519.imageshack.us/my.php?image=fffdfdfta3.png][IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/4272/fffdfdfta3.th.png[/img][/URL]
and yes ive set up a no-ip for the people to connect my server runs fine its just people cannot connect only i can
[URL=http://img224.imageshack.us/my.php?image=fgfdggp8.png][IMG]http://img224.imageshack.us/img224/6044/fgfdggp8.th.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img224.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL]
click to enlarge^ :confused:

item.title: People cant connect only i can [i need help]
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“coheed, post:10, topic:238013”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=314233.msg2499422#msg2499422 date=1224563781]
uugh, its like posting a advertisement for a server and saying “it’s for my server”.

You just don’t get it. you can’t say something and make it true.

[/quote]

well so ur saying im advertizing?

did i say the ip?? im just requesting server help in the “server help” section this is for people who have problems with there server and i dont need someone telling me im advertizing or asking for computer help[/quote]

Your stupid it’s an analogy.

Read full topic

item.title: People cant connect only i can [i need help]
item.dc:creator: @coheed coheed
item.description:
@coheed wrote:

yes i know but i remeber seing a post on here but i cannot find it it was about a common error that people make it has to do with the subnet ip the dns ip and default gateway but i forgot where it is on here and i know thats the key i remember i have to go into network connections or something but idk please solve this

Read full topic
item.source: People cant connect only i can [i need help]

item.title: People cant connect only i can [i need help]
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“coheed, post:8, topic:238013”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=314233.msg2499417#msg2499417 date=1224563440]

Um, the sticke’d topic on this section THE RULES read rule 2, it will tell you that you should not post computer problem such as PORT FORWARDING or we will smack you around with a cold noodle.

:S its not a computer problem its with my server… so people can connect

ah, but in the rules it states anything to do with port forwarding is classified as “computer problems”.

You have just been pwnt.

  1. We will not help with computer problems, ie: [size=21pt]portforwarding[/size], how to set up java and such. Use google or our Tutorial Section.

Use your friend
[/quote]

i know!!! its not portforwarding its so people can connect to my server if you ever read i sayed i portforwarded its for my server not my computer!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2008, 10:36:11 pm[/size][hr]
click to enlarge[/quote]
It’s simple. Weather you think that you portforwarded correctly or not, you didn’t. You need to portforward correctly to let people connect. Period.

Read full topic
